Juzentaihoto is also used for decubitus ulcers, radiation sickness, rheumatoid arthritis, supportive therapy in cancer, and to reduce adverse effects from surgical treatment and chemotherapy. The indications given by the Japanese national health insurance for Hochuekkito are related to general vigor, anorexia, myasthenia gravis, chronic gastritis, and atopic dermatitis.
